article_title: Stephen Colbert holds a farewell yard sale — tries to sell Michael Stipe for under $1
article_text:
Topics: Colbert Countdown, Michael Stipe, R.E.M., Stephen Colbert, The Colbert Report, Video, yard sale, Innovation News, Entertainment News

During the penultimate episode of “The Colbert Report,” Stephen Colbert paid homage to his incredible studio, left his ever-watching mark on the rooftop, and parted ways with his many tchotchkes at a yard sale.

Among the knickknacks that had to go were pints of Americone Dream, Ass Juice, a passport for his balls, an assortment of figurines and R.E.M. frontman Michael Stipe (who was marked down from $1 to 25 cents).

It is the end of an era; watch below:

And here Stephen says goodbye to his studio:
